name: OR_IMP_WASTED
description: The OR_IMP_WASTED table contains OR management system implant waste information.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the implant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the waste information for the implant.

columns.name: WASTED_DATE
columns.description: The date that the implant was wasted.

columns.name: WASTE_LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the log in which the implant was wasted.

columns.name: WASTE_NOTIFY_DATE
columns.description: The date the manufacturer was notified that the implant was wasted.

columns.name: REASON_WASTED_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value of the reason the implant was wasted.

columns.name: WASTED_TIME
columns.description: The exact time an implant was marked as wasted.
